critique: This document pertains to the amendment of an executive order regarding the President's Commission on Strategic Forces. It focuses on reviewing progress in implementing recommendations related to strategic forces, particularly concerning missile systems and arms control. The document itself doesn't directly address ideological tilts, immigration, or social inclusion. It primarily deals with national security and executive actions related to defense strategy. Therefore, most axes will be scored as neutral, with some consideration given to the national security aspect and executive power.
